subject: Investing
title: Seed Phrases and Private Keys
description: One-minute skill: Seed Phrases and Private Keys.

hook.text: Twelve random words. That's all that stands between you and your entire crypto fortuneâ€”or losing it forever.

buildup.text: A seed phrase generates all your private keys. Anyone with those 12 or 24 words controls your funds.

discovery.text: Private keys sign transactions, proving you authorized the transfer. The blockchain verifies the signature.

twist.text: No customer support can reset your seed phrase. There's no 'forgot password' in self-custody.

climax.text: Store your seed phrase on metal, in a safe, offline. Never type it into a website or share it.

punchline.text: Your seed phrase is your bank vault key. Treat it accordingly.

quiz.question: What should you never do with your seed phrase?
options: Type it into a website or share it
